name: Garlic Herb Compound Butter

ingredients.ingredient: small garlic clove, finely grated or mashed

instructions: In a bowl, combine the softened butter with garlic, parsley, thyme, salt, pepper, and lemon zest if using.
Mash and mix with a fork or spatula until thoroughly combined and smooth.
Spoon the mixture onto a piece of parchment or plastic wrap.
Form into a log shape and twist the ends to seal.
Chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes or until firm.
Slice into coins and serve over hot steaks just after plating.

storage_tips.fridge: Store in an airtight container or wrapped log for up to 1 week.
storage_tips.freezer: Freeze for up to 3 months. Pre-slice into coins for convenience.
